text:
We have been with Gerorgina for my daughter in-toes and flat foot issue. Gone through a thorough treatment, exercises, feet braces and we can see massive improvement in my daughter's posture and feet.

Georgina and the staff have been very helpful and making every visit smooth and pleasant. Keep up the good work!

Came back for yearly maintainence and had a great experience as per usual. Georgina was attentive and extremely helpful. Staff was very friendly and always willing to help.

Overall new location of clinic was easy to get to and not crowded. The view gave the clinic a nice and calming atmosphere too during the checkup.

A great place to treat podiatry related services. Georgina is one of the best and supportive person for the kids I have ever get in touch. All the officials and staffs are very friendly and accommodating.

Have been seeing Ms Georgina for my 3 y.o's inward legs. His condition has improved a lot with the recommended corrective measures and exercises. Ms Georgina is detail and can handle kids very well. The location is clean and fun my LO looks forward to his appointment everytime.
